title: Former President Bill Clinton Hospitalized With Non-Covid Infection
sub_head: Mr. Clinton was admitted to the University of California Irvine Medical Center on Tuesday, his spokesman said
body:
Former President Bill Clinton was admitted to a hospital in California Tuesday with an infection unrelated to Covid-19, a spokesman said.
Mr. Clinton, 75, was admitted to UC Irvine Medical Center, said spokesman Angel Ureña in a tweeted statement Thursday night.
